verify_code.title: Verify your identity
verify_code.desc: Before we can let you through, we need to verify your identity. You should have received an email with a verification code
verify_code.invalid_otp_error: OTP Code must be of 6 digits. Please enter correct the OTP.
verify_code.sent_new_otp: A new email is sent, you should receive it shortly

home.smart_crop_tooltip: When you need to have full control in every aspect of your retouching on-model images this is the automation for you.
home.unrecognizable_crop_tooltip: On-model images that need to be cropped above a face marker such as the lips, nose, between the nose & eyes should use this automation. It will crop a batch of images to make the face unrecognizable. Common use-case include fashion photos, wholesale images listed on retail sites or eCommerce marketplaces.
home.remove_bg_resize_tooltip: This is an automation has broad use-cases. Anytime you need to retouch - resize, replace or remove background -  multiple images in bulk with or without models or persons in it, this automation is a big time saver.
home.listing_analyzer_tooltip: If you have a marketplace listing such as an Amazon or Walmart seller central listing, you can use this automation to measure how your images will perform against the bestsellers and what can you do to improve your conversions.
home.no_data: No automation projects are configured yet. Go ahead, create one!
home.duplicate_desc: You’re about to start a new {{automationType}} automation!
